name: Idle Capital Street
description:
Welcome to Idle Capital Street! This is a simulated business kingdom which brings all the ambitious young investors together that you can learn to make the investing as well as you can. So, are you ready for it?

How to play?
-- Tap to harvest and collect money. Start your business journey from the small items. Each items including shopping mall, cinema, restaurant etc will sell goods and help to generate money. Keep clicking each item to harvest and gain money!
-- Invest on your buildings and make them larger and upgrade with the cash you've earned. The higher level of each building is, the more and faster money will be generated.
-- In this idle game, what you need to do is keeping tapping. Earn, build and upgrade. So you can fully experience the process from an unknown man to a business tycoon. Just do it.
-- Hire managers to work for you. Easy yourself and make it more fun.

Game Features:
-- Three different continents with beautiful and refined graphics
-- Easy gameplay with just clicking
-- Various rops bring you the ultimate gaming experience!

So are you ready for a journey of global economy monopoly? Do you want to prove your commercial strength in a shortest possible time? Are you still confused about how to start your business map? Idle capital street will be your best choice.

Come and join us to create another commercial legend!
